website_summaries.verdict: The entry-level Canon PowerShot A2400 IS and its IS-less linemate the A2300 are simple cameras with nice picture quality for casual snapshooters, but the price difference isn't worth sacrificing the image stabilization.
pros: The Canon PowerShot A2400 IS and PowerShot A2300 have very good picture quality for their class and are loaded with effects and filters
cons: The cameras' flat buttons and cramped layout may make use difficult for some and shooting performance is slow, particularly shot-to-shot
The lenses require a lot of light or high ISOs when zoomed in

customer_reviews.title: great product
customer_reviews.text: I will buy again from this merchant. Further, and very important. Think Green, Please protect animals and plants, recycle everything you can, no littering and use it enough to completely finish any product. Transmit this message to others. Compraré nuevamente en este negocio. adicionalmente, Piensa Verde, por favor protege a los animales y las plantas, recicla todo lo que puedas, no echar basura, usa todo hasta el final, transmite este mensaje a otros.
customer_reviews.author: A customer

customer_reviews.title: Blurry
customer_reviews.text: I guess I am just used to my Canon DSLR that takes million dollar pictures. I purchased this one, in hopes of using it out on the water, or during hikes, etc, etc, where I wouldn't want to take my nice camera. The image quality is kinda grainy, but again I think its just that I am used to such a high resolution camera. I will say, it tends to take better pictures outside than inside. Good for the prices I guess, just don't expect to blow up any of the pictures to anything larger than a standard 4x6 print.
customer_reviews.author: Taylor Davenport

customer_reviews.title: Great clarity, most of the time
customer_reviews.text: I like the camera a lot. It took quite a while to arrive from the shipper (not sure why....) You really need to read the directions to learn how all the buttons and thingys work. I didn't do that and ended up disappointed with some not-so-great pics from a recent day trip. It has a LONG life battery that you charge on the wall, so BIG PLUS that you don't have to suck up AA batteries every 15 minutes. Uploads easily, nice video feature.
customer_reviews.author: MzzA

customer_reviews.title: I bought one for the road and im buying another my mom
customer_reviews.text: I bought this camera to take on the road for two years. One of the perks i noticed is that it takes a nice picture when in the car and moving at 45-50 mph. The only thing is that I wished it would zoom more then 5x. But other then that it is great. The pictures come out very clear and clean. My mom liked it too so I'm going to get her one for Christmas. I like the fast transfer. It only takes about 30 sec to transfer your photos to your computer and it makes it's own folder with the date of transfer or you can name it yourself while transferring.
customer_reviews.author: Willow Cullen

customer_reviews.title: works great!!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this as my old point and shoot no longer works. I have used this several times and the pictures come out very well. The camera is very easy to use and auto mode works just fine for most shots. I have taken most of my pictures during the day and had excellent results. My only negative about the camera is it does take a while to take the picture so if your looking for some quick action shots, this probably isnt the camera for you.
customer_reviews.author: S. Wieprzkowski

customer_reviews.title: Great value and easy to use
customer_reviews.text: I bought my A2300 two years ago and it has been a really great value in a simple camera. I have found most of the functions pretty intuitive and have been very happy with the quality of the pictures I've take with it. The only slight disappointment is that night time photos of moon and seascapes are not very good but that is to be expected with this type of camera I would say. Highly recommended.
customer_reviews.author: Steve R.

customer_reviews.title: Nice Cannon PowerShot Camera - Takes GREAT Pictures
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this for my daughter and her boyfriend. Her boyfriend is into technology and he says it take great pictures and they have never had any issues with it. I bought it for them in 2012. Still going strong.
customer_reviews.author: Brenda S.

customer_reviews.title: ... years ago - my current camera Samsung G7 is better at
customer_reviews.text: bought a few years ago - my current camera Samsung G7 is better at closeups
customer_reviews.author: Peggy

customer_reviews.title: My wife liked it but...
customer_reviews.text: This was a gift for my wife. It does everything great but has no built in effects. She misses the basic effects her old camera had like black and white and frames. We are just regular snap and shoot folks. We have software on the computer but its an extra step. Otherwise its light, compact and looks like a fairly quality product.
customer_reviews.author: TheFakeFarmer

customer_reviews.title: Canon PowerShot A2300 16.0 MP Digital Camera with 5x Optical Zoom
customer_reviews.text: I bought this camera to replace a Kodak Easy Share. Big mistake. It is so much more complicated that I haven't really learned how to use it yet. However, I am admittedly not tech-savy. I wanted a camera to take simple snaphots and this camera tries to do too many things. I also do not like the rechargeable battery. It never seems to be charged when I want to try to use the camera and I don't know what you do if the battery dies while you are out somewhere. I would much rather have batteries for instant use. Don't know about the quality of pictures it takes because I haven't printed any.
customer_reviews.author: Shirley K. Coffman

customer_reviews.title: Nice color
customer_reviews.text: Great little camera. Nice and light and AUTO really is AUTO. It shoots without flash inside with low light, which gives better color. You have to make sure you have the right size settings or the pictures will get cut off if you want 4x6 pictures. Otherwise good camera.
customer_reviews.author: Rick W

customer_reviews.title: good little camera for my needs
customer_reviews.text: i needed a camera to have handy to take pictures of my girls. This camera is small enough for a pocket, simple to use, and takes good pictures. Truthfully, I've not read the instructions and it probably does more than I know. But for quick snap shots when I don't have my cell phone it works great for me.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Ok for the money but I am not very impressed ...
customer_reviews.text: Ok for the money but I am not very impressed with the image quality. I was expecting more based on the reviews I had read on Amazon. On the other hand I usually take pics with a SLR so maybe my expectations are too high.
customer_reviews.author: Beemar

customer_reviews.title: The camera is great the packaging could have been better
customer_reviews.text: the camera works great the pictures are awesome, the packaging was horrible the camera was in its box packaged in a bigger box with no bubble or paper to keep it from sliding back and forth which I am sure it did many times which could effect the camera later on. Next time please package the item better!
customer_reviews.author: charityk

customer_reviews.title: My Canon PowerShot A2300. A small camera with big abilities!
customer_reviews.text: I was very impressed with my Canon PowerShot A2300 16.0 MP Digital Camera with 5x Optical Zoom. It is small and compact. Very easy to carry and use. I love to take pictures of all the nature around my home and this little camera is ideal. My friends love to see the photos I post on Face Book. When they ask me about the camera I use, I rave about my Canon to them. This is a perfect camera for me and I never fail to recommend it to my friends.
customer_reviews.author: Salathome1

customer_reviews.title: Small and light are the pluses
customer_reviews.text: Slow response and Grady looking in door pictures and video is the down side. Out doors is good and Sun light is best.
customer_reviews.author: oliver crawford sr

customer_reviews.title: I love mine! I don't like to go about sightseeing ...
customer_reviews.text: I love mine! I don't like to go about sightseeing with a huge camera dangling from my neck. While it is small enough to stay in a pocket till needed the Canon Power Shot gets great pictures. Which matters: I have at times been granted permission to take a photo with the little Canon where tourists with larger cameras were denied it.
customer_reviews.author: Eva Hailbronner

customer_reviews.title: fits in the palm of my hand great little camera
customer_reviews.text: easy to use affordable compact fits in your pocker takes wonderful shots I already had the canin printer so now I can skio the memery card in the slpt and print my favorites in seconds.
customer_reviews.author: Vicki Lucas

customer_reviews.title: I LOVE IT!
customer_reviews.text: This camera is a very simple point and click camera. This is exactly what I needed for those moments that I'm too drunk to operate my professional camera. Some people were complaining that it took too long to take the next picture or it said "busy"; get a better SD card fools! This camera is awesome!
customer_reviews.author: John

customer_reviews.title: Nice camera for the money
customer_reviews.text: I like this camera. We got it for our 11 year old and it is sufficient for this. The colors are not as vibrant as with my similarly priced Fuji camera and it's not quite as easy to use, but with a little practice it takes good pics.
customer_reviews.author: hamfamfun

customer_reviews.title: The directions are not clear in all areas
customer_reviews.text: I have been reading and working with the options, I am finding some of the directions are not as specific as I would like them to be. The photos are very good quality, transferring to the computer is simple and easy.
customer_reviews.author: Garden Rose

customer_reviews.title: Great camera that anyone can use.
customer_reviews.text: I got this camera for my parents to take on vacation. Simplicity was key. My parents are not tech savvy and they were able to operate the camera with out issues in just a few minutes. The rechargeable battery is great too. Not disappointed at all great buy.
customer_reviews.author: ITGuy1024

customer_reviews.title: GREAT!
customer_reviews.text: Great bargain and price! This camera works well. I do have the large Canon that I use for my better pictures etc, but can' always tote around. this fits perfectly into my diaper bag or purse and always have a camera for on the go!
customer_reviews.author: maureen maurano

customer_reviews.title: good little camera
customer_reviews.text: This camera is good for those that want a small, portable camera that takes good pics while going out. Probably won't suffice those that want photographer quality pics, but that's not what I need, so I'm satisfied!
customer_reviews.author: Defman2g

customer_reviews.title: This is an excellent camera!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this camera as a gift for my sister and she is enjoying it immensely. It is a compact camera with a lot of horsepower. It is a great deal for the price. I would highly recommend its purchase!
customer_reviews.author: CD music collector

customer_reviews.title: Canon
customer_reviews.text: Canon seems to always have the camera business just right. For the money, I don't think you can buy better than Canon. It is fairly simple to use, more so than many.
customer_reviews.author: drhcruises

customer_reviews.title: Perfect
customer_reviews.text: Great camera . . . great for beginners and easy to use. Self-explanatory, priced right, and small enough to carry everywhere. Plus, you can never go wrong with a Canon.
customer_reviews.author: gardenia

customer_reviews.title: Great Camera
customer_reviews.text: Love my camera!!! I'm a novice, so this camera is excellent for me. Takes great pictures. Nice size. Exceeded my expectations I love it.
customer_reviews.author: Missthing72

customer_reviews.title: Great little camera!
customer_reviews.text: I love this little camera! So small you can carry it in your pocket but it takes awesome pictures. The zoom quality is great and the pictures come out beautiful. Best purchase I have ever made.
customer_reviews.author: Renee K. Farr

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use
customer_reviews.text: Easy to use, battery lasts forever. Zoom leaves much to be desired. Croping pictures on the computer leaves them highly pixelated
customer_reviews.author: mk

customer_reviews.title: canons are the best
customer_reviews.text: great camera for its price point... picture quality of the camera with its 16.0 megapixel is outstanding. Optical Image Zone is very decent. Again price point of camera is outstanding.
customer_reviews.author: Joe

customer_reviews.title: perfect!
customer_reviews.text: The pic are great with this camera, is does't weigth at all, is practical ,simple and cute. Thank you very much for the camara and the service it came early that i espected !
customer_reviews.author: Mayerling E

customer_reviews.title: Good little camera
customer_reviews.text: Small price and rechargable battery along with the small size of this camera make it just what I needed for every day picture taking. The only complaint might be that the instruction book does not explain fully how to access all the settings.
customer_reviews.author: fluteplayer

customer_reviews.title: Great camera, great price
customer_reviews.text: This camera is so easy to use, takes great pictures, and the zoom is phenomenal! I used it to take a picture of a moose in our yard/woods and with the zoom it looked like he was standing right in front of me. Far anyone who knows about moose, you don't want one standing anywhere near you...but the picture looked like he was :) Very pleased with the quality and the price!
customer_reviews.author: jolielune

customer_reviews.title: good camera
customer_reviews.text: the fish eye feature is pretty fun....... its a good camera.. my only complaint is you have to hold down the button longer than my old camera had to..........i think it should be like $50... rather that the $72 we paid.
customer_reviews.author: brandon

customer_reviews.title: great camera
customer_reviews.text: This camera is so small and lightweight. But I didn't know you could buy a bundle and I ended up buying the case and the memory card separate. The price was very good for such a nice product.
customer_reviews.author: Therese M. Darby

customer_reviews.title: Buy this Camera
customer_reviews.text: Easy to operate and compact. Just charge the battery with the charger provided.
customer_reviews.author: nothinbtalady

customer_reviews.title: Indoor photos very grainy
customer_reviews.text: I thought I was upgrading from my Canon Elph PowerShot SD1100IS 8MP when I bought this camera. While pictures in full light outside are clearly better than my older camera, it was definitely worse than the 8MP camera for indoor shots. Lots of grainy and fuzzy edges. I was not happy with the drop in performance indoors. I'll update this as I use it more, but so far it wasn't a completely successful replacement for my Elph. It also irritated me that Amazon dropped the price $20 just 2 days after I purchased it.
customer_reviews.author: CP

customer_reviews.title: Returned for upgrade
customer_reviews.text: I was looking for a Canon compact camera that had more features than this one, so I returned it.
customer_reviews.author: MARILYN GEISELMAN

customer_reviews.title: Great, Easy to Use Camera
customer_reviews.text: Purchased this camera as a prize at our yearly Family Fun Carnival. It is easy to use, takes great pictures, and is small enough to carry with you wherever you go.
customer_reviews.author: Ken

customer_reviews.title: Good Pictures but very slow shutter!
customer_reviews.text: The camera looks good and is small, when I go to special events I like to put things in my pocket, so it is a good size for that! What I don't like about this camera is that whenever I, or someone else, trys to take a picture, It lags. It doesn't take for a good 3-5 seconds or it doesn't take at all! This has causes me to miss special moments at my sister graduation. Overall, It's a great looking camera, but It is slow!
customer_reviews.author: meganjan

customer_reviews.title: Nice Camera
customer_reviews.text: Canon makes the best cameras around. Bought this to be able to take pictures at dog shows, and not have to always lug around our digital slr.
customer_reviews.author: Kelly OBrien

customer_reviews.title: Works Temporarily.
customer_reviews.text: Well, as I had just recently written a positive review, the camera is shot. After less than 8 months and probably a grand total of 50 photos, the shutter is jammed. Everything seems to work otherwise, but it does not perform its most basic function that it should. All photos are a solid black. The camera has never been dropped, is physically flawless, and was always kept in a protective case. Loss of trust in Canon with this toy.
customer_reviews.author: Team Brule

customer_reviews.title: Won't Turn On
customer_reviews.text: Less than 6 months after purchase, the camera won't turn on. The battery is fully charged. The problem started suddenly and without warning. One day, it was working fine. The next, it's useless.
customer_reviews.author: Korin

customer_reviews.title: Blah
customer_reviews.text: Maybe it's just me, but it seems my old Fuji FinePix A303 took better photos. I will do some more tweaking with my images and see
customer_reviews.author: Becky S Lilley

customer_reviews.title: Great gift!
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my boyfriend as a present. Its easy to use and navigate the different functions that my 80 year old mother could use it with no issues.
customer_reviews.author: Lisa Davis

customer_reviews.title: great camera
customer_reviews.text: I wasn't sure about ordering a camera online, but i figured you can't go wrong with the Canon brand. I am pleased to say i am very happy with this nice little camera.
customer_reviews.author: Angela J. Martin

customer_reviews.title: Works good
customer_reviews.text: Great little pocket camera dont expect to get professional shots with it or go crazy its still a pocket camera but it works for those times you dont want to lug around your big camera
customer_reviews.author: Firemonkey

customer_reviews.title: Good camera.
customer_reviews.text: A great camera for a decent price. I've always used Powershots and if they keep making them as good as these, I'll keep using them in the future.
customer_reviews.author: Person

customer_reviews.title: good  value
customer_reviews.text: Love the camera and the fact the battery is rechargeable
customer_reviews.author: enufpets

customer_reviews.title: Canon PowerShot A2300 16.0 MP Digital Camera
customer_reviews.text: The camera was very light and compact and these were two important reasons why purchased. Pictures were not as clear as expected.
customer_reviews.author: WDS

customer_reviews.title: good little camera
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my daughter. She seems to be well pleased with it. Great value - good pictures - small - easy to use.
customer_reviews.author: Sunshine

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use!
customer_reviews.text: I got this camera because I wanted one that took great pictures but was easy to use. This camera does that, even the directions are easy to read. My pictures came out clear and sharp. I'm glad I bought it.
customer_reviews.author: Cheryl

customer_reviews.title: Sharp Images
customer_reviews.text: The HD Quality is superb ! The pictures and video are sharp and vivid and the camera is easy to use.
customer_reviews.author: Ivori Murray

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic Camera / Value
customer_reviews.text: Very light and easy to travel with this camera. Super easy to use. Takes awesome pictures! Huge improvement vs. prior models for sure.
customer_reviews.author: Daniel P. Biggs

customer_reviews.title: Not a good camera.
customer_reviews.text: Not a good camera. I have not used it any more. It is not that great. what a waist of money.
customer_reviews.author: adrian roig

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful
customer_reviews.text: Rcd in 2 days- great camera! Pictures are very sharp and the camera is user friendly and takes wonderful pics! I would recommend it to a friend.
customer_reviews.author: Trish

customer_reviews.title: A gift.
customer_reviews.text: I bought this camera for my girl friend's Birthday, she loooooves it ! She is still thanking me months after.
customer_reviews.author: Debbie

customer_reviews.title: best camera on the market.
customer_reviews.text: this is the best camera for the money. you can't buy a better one. this is the best.. i love it.
customer_reviews.author: Salvatore Ganno

customer_reviews.title: Canon camera review.
customer_reviews.text: The cameras are good cameras, but the lens on all of the cameras we purchased are already broken and will not work. We had to send them to the Canon company in order to get the lens fixed because we bought them a month ago and they didn't work any longer.
customer_reviews.author: Brittany

customer_reviews.title: love it
customer_reviews.text: i love this camera it so great as soon as i got it i started using it takes great pictures
customer_reviews.author: claribel valentin

customer_reviews.title: Great camera
customer_reviews.text: This camera is so small and takes great pictures. It is, also, easy to use and download pictures to our computer
customer_reviews.author: Jeanette Stricklin

customer_reviews.title: Great point and shoot!
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my elderly mother and she had no problem figuring out how to use it. It takes great family pics....exactly what she wanted. :)
customer_reviews.author: P. Behr

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Camera was exactly what I expected. If was used but I could not even tell.
customer_reviews.author: Blenda E. Smith

customer_reviews.title: Great Point and Shooy
customer_reviews.text: I was looking for a easy to use, grab and go, point and click for my classroom. This camera is perfect! It takes good indoor and outdoor photos. It can catch kids running on the playground without blurring them. This Canon PowerShot is well worth the money.
customer_reviews.author: drizzle

customer_reviews.title: Good camera
customer_reviews.text: What can I say.. it is a Canon so it is a good camera. Similar to all of its kind. Shipping was extra fast.
customer_reviews.author: Christian

customer_reviews.title: Great Point and Shoot
customer_reviews.text: I love Canon cameras. Have had several of them over the years. I like that they come with a rechargeable battery. The quality of the pictures is great and user interface is simple.
customer_reviews.author: C. Cummings

customer_reviews.title: nice
customer_reviews.text: very nice. i still need to play with it more but for the price it was a steal. i cant complain
customer_reviews.author: crystal

customer_reviews.title: Canon
customer_reviews.text: Great camera the only thing I wish I know that it was one that has a battery you charge. Cause I sure would of made a few more with my order but great camera like it better them my other one.
customer_reviews.author: Larry

customer_reviews.title: Great photos
customer_reviews.text: Canon Powershot A2300A2300 is an amazing camera. Small enough to tuck away in a pocket so it is always available. Photos are amazing. I have gotten many compliments on the nighttime pictures of snow covered areas using only moonlight for illumination. My one problem with the product is there is no internal memory. Not a big issue. Very nice camera at a low price.
customer_reviews.author: GrammieB

customer_reviews.title: Camera
customer_reviews.text: This camera takes good pictures but sadly did not come with an instruction booklet. If I did not have another type of Canon camera I would not know how to use it.
customer_reviews.author: B. Heine

customer_reviews.title: Simple Enough for A Mom to Use
customer_reviews.text: This was purchased as a gift for a Mom that has been using a film camera. Needed it to be big screen and simple operation. So far, so good.
customer_reviews.author: amuzme

customer_reviews.title: Canon camera
customer_reviews.text: This is a nice and handy camera i love it. It is great. takes good photo and works well. powerful
customer_reviews.author: June P Hawkins

customer_reviews.title: Good
customer_reviews.text: Though I had to press very hardly to click one single photo, still with such low price quality camera is really rare in market
customer_reviews.author: Mohammad Arif Ul Alam

customer_reviews.title: Great Camera
customer_reviews.text: This is an outstanding value. Great camera! Much better than my old 5MP and the one in my phone. Easy and fun to operate and fantastic picture quality.
customer_reviews.author: David Daniel

customer_reviews.title: love it!
customer_reviews.text: Such a great value for the money. The picture quality is exceptional. The best part is that it is so compact and goes everywhere I go - I use it all the time because it is so easy and convenient. So much better than hauling around my larger camera. Love it!
customer_reviews.author: cupcake queen234

customer_reviews.title: Great camera
customer_reviews.text: Easy to use , takes great pictures and very compact. I would recommend it highly. Cannon makes wonderful cameras at great prices.
customer_reviews.author: Pamela M. Jackson

customer_reviews.title: Cannon PowerShot A2300
customer_reviews.text: Good amera for the price. Took very good pictures. Easy to carry in purse or pocket. The problem I had with it, it took abouit 17 pictures and the battery went out. I would advise carrying an extra battery with you.
customer_reviews.author: Helen Knetzer

customer_reviews.title: Good camera for the price!
customer_reviews.text: The camera works well and the charge lasts a decent amount of time. The only complaint is that there is not a way to manually turn on the flash just only to have it off.
customer_reviews.author: Charles Wilson

customer_reviews.title: Fits well in your purse!
customer_reviews.text: Very nice camera. Light weight - I can carry it in my purse easily. Wide angel lense is just a bit smaller than I had hoped, but the pictures are really good.
customer_reviews.author: Nancy Skaggs

customer_reviews.title: Great Camera
customer_reviews.text: Awesome camera! Glad I made a great choice. it took me weeks of reading reviews to find the right camera. After much reading I decided on this camera and I am glad I bought this one.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Ok at best
customer_reviews.text: I have had the camera now for a few months and am not thrilled with it. The pictures often turn out somewhat fuzzy and the camera has a cheap look to it.
customer_reviews.author: Alexis S

customer_reviews.title: Nice camera and pics
customer_reviews.text: Easy to use with good video capabilities. I would recommend ths camera to beginners on up. I really like it
customer_reviews.author: Michelle VanRossum

customer_reviews.title: Really like Canon Power Shot
customer_reviews.text: Exactly what I expect from what I call a pocket camera;small,easy to use &functional.The price was right too,about $50 for a used camera in pretty much perfect condition.
customer_reviews.author: David A.

customer_reviews.title: Good First Camera
customer_reviews.text: I like this camera it is a good first camera for someone who knows nothing about taking pics with a digital camera
customer_reviews.author: KIKI

customer_reviews.title: Gorgeous pictures
customer_reviews.text: Bought this to take to Italy and the pictures look like they are professional. High res and perfect! Love it!
customer_reviews.author: Amy Rita

customer_reviews.title: useful
customer_reviews.text: if I find a good product, very useful for home and daily wear and also for capturing great moments. I am pleased
customer_reviews.author: michael ugueto

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great camera easy to use. The pictures are so clear.
customer_reviews.author: Florida guy

customer_reviews.title: Great deal
customer_reviews.text: Got it with a discount, tried it as soon as I got it, could not believe it is a point and shoot with so many options, the optical zoom is great, and the pictures with it plus digital zoom are awesome.
customer_reviews.author: Maria Teresa Bolivar de Perez

customer_reviews.title: Good buy.
customer_reviews.text: Easy to use. Would recommend for anyone wanting a good easy to use camera. Can't go wrong with this camera.
customer_reviews.author: Greg Elliott

customer_reviews.title: Canon Digital Camera
customer_reviews.text: I hesitated on buying a digital camera for years, now that I have I am not disappointed. I have always loved Canon products & this one is compact, fits in my pocket & takes wonderful pics.
customer_reviews.author: Beth Good

customer_reviews.title: Great Camera
customer_reviews.text: I have had this Camera for over a year, and have been very pleased with the quality of photos and videos that I have been able to get with it. For such a low cost, great pictures are a click away.
customer_reviews.author: Susan

customer_reviews.title: as advertised
customer_reviews.text: met expectations, easy to use, easy to carry, more than enough storage, would recommend to anyone needing compact easy to use camera
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great Camera
customer_reviews.text: It takes great shots, easy to use, and it was cheap.......Thanks * * * * * * * * *
customer_reviews.author: Steve

customer_reviews.title: Canon Digital Camera A2300
customer_reviews.text: Very disappointed. Returned product for full refund because it felt cheap and did not work. Was unable to open the battery compartment. Have had Canon cameras in the past and was very pleased but this one was just not well made for what we wanted and expected even at this price.
customer_reviews.author: Eugene

customer_reviews.title: rating of camera
customer_reviews.text: easy to use, make its adjustments while shooting, viewing past pictures are easy access. would recommend to buyers and others.
customer_reviews.author: beverley metivier

customer_reviews.title: Superman Camera
customer_reviews.text: My wife has managed to distroy every camera that I have given her. If she has not dropped it, as she moves about with the camera strapped to her wrist, it gets hit against some furniture. This camer is virtually indestructable! And it takes expellent pictures at the same time. If I knew that it was so good, I would have purchased one for my teenage son and myself.
customer_reviews.author: mjacobson

customer_reviews.title: Great Camera
customer_reviews.text: It"s the perfect size for what I what I need.It will do the job.Everyone needs this camera.It"s easy to work.
customer_reviews.author: Brenda M.

customer_reviews.title: Light weight and fast picture taking...
customer_reviews.text: I love that with the camera, you can adjust the time of the preview of the pictures you take or turn it off all together. This is a VERY light weight camera. I bought the Ravelli APLT2 tripod to go with it, and it fits WONDERFULLY!
customer_reviews.author: audio_stan

customer_reviews.title: Worst CAMERA EVER!
customer_reviews.text: This is my 3rd one of these and all 3 the zoom lense has busted. It locks up and it won't open and close on it's own.
customer_reviews.author: Julie Clifton

product_meta.title: Canon PowerShot A2300 16.0 MP Digital Camera with 5x Optical Zoom (Silver)
product_meta.description:
The Canon 6184B100 PowerShot A2300 16MP Compact Digital Camera, in silver, is simple and stylish. This chic compact camera is packed with advancements that make it easy to get a great shot every time. Smart AUTO recognizes 32 predefined shooting situations then automatically picks the proper camera settings for you. Saving memories in breathtakingly realistic 720p HD is as easy as pressing the dedicated movie button. You will see extraordinary resolution and fast performance with the 16.0 Megapixel Image Sensor and DIGIC 4 Image Processor, and capture more dynamic, exciting images with the 5x Optical Zoom with 28mm Wide-Angle lens. Digital IS greatly reduces blur by recognizing the main subject and applying the best camera shake correction. Easy quality that is easily affordable. That's the PowerShot A2300 digital camera.

FROM THE MANUFACTURER
 

ADVANCED TO MAKE SHOOTING SIMPLE
Simple and stylish, this chic compact camera is packed with advancements that make it easy to get a great shot every time. Smart AUTO recognizes 32 predefined shooting situations, then automatically picks the proper camera settings for you. Saving memories in breathtakingly realistic 720p HD is as easy as pressing the dedicated movie button. You'll see extraordinary resolution and fast performance with the 16.0 Megapixel Image Sensor and DIGIC 4 Image Processor, and capture more dynamic, exciting images with the 5x Optical Zoom with 28mm Wide-Angle lens. New Digital IS greatly reduces blur by recognizing the main subject and applying the best camera shake correction. Easy quality that's easily affordable: that's the PowerShot A2300 digital camera!

A SMARTER CAMERA MEANS BETTER PHOTOS
SMART AUTO
Photographers of all levels appreciate a camera – especially a go-anywhere compact digital – that takes the hassle out of capturing beautiful images. The PowerShot A2300 gives you Smart AUTO – sophisticated Canon technology that makes getting that great shot as simple as pressing the shutter button. Smart AUTO automatically detects scenes by assessing various factors in both the background and the subject. Detected scenes are analyzed using 32 predefined shooting situations. The camera then makes optimal settings to ensure the best possible image capture when shooting still images. Smart AUTO also includes Advanced Subject Detection, which allows the camera to detect and track non-human moving subjects like animals and vehicles. With Smart AUTO, all you have to do is frame your shot and capture away.

SHOOTING MODES/SPECIAL SCENE MODES
Smart AUTO The camera automatically selects the best shooting settings for optimal quality based on subjects and environmental factors to provide point-and-shoot simplicity. Program The camera automatically and intelligently selects the aperture/shutter speed combination based on the shooting conditions. Live View Control Enables Brightness, Color, and Tone adjustments to your images using easy-to-understand controls. Digital IS The camera digitally corrects image blur by analyzing the subject prior to choosing the best correction method. Portrait Brings the subject into focus while beautifully blurring the background. Face Self-timer The camera waits for a face to enter the frame before releasing the shutter. Low Light For high quality image capture in an amazing range of dimly lit situations. Fisheye Effect Now you can get the fisheye effect – a classic photographic distortion – without a fisheye lens. Miniature Effect Give images a miniature look with an effect that emphasizes perspective by blurring the top and bottom of the image. Toy Camera Effect Simulates photos taken with a toy or pinhole cameras, darkening the image at the edges to create a vignette effect. Monochrome Choose from three single-tone effects: Black-and-White, Sepia, or Blue. Super Vivid Super Vivid intensifies existing hues, saturating the scene with bright colors. Poster Effect Poster Effect combines several similar shades into one color, turning subtle gradations into eye-catching, scene-popping contrasts. Snow Shoot clear snow scenes without darkened subjects or an unnatural bluish tint. Fireworks Create brilliant images of skyrocketing fireworks. Long Shutter Use to blur moving subjects for artistic effect, ideal for urban night photography. Discreet Mode Disables flash, AF assist beam, and all camera sounds with one mode dial settingâ€“so you can capture images in quiet areas. iFrame Movie The Apple® movie format, iFrame, makes it easier and quicker to import and upload videos while retaining high image quality. 
GORGEOUS HD VIDEO FROM YOUR STILL CAMERA
720P HD VIDEO 
You can shoot high definition video anytime, anywhere right from the pocket-sized A2300 digital camera. With a simple push of the dedicated movie button, youâ€™ll be able to instantly record every moment in motion. 720p HD video is smooth, vivid, and beautifully lifelike, making it an ideal way to capture special memories. In addition to being able to shoot 720p HD video at 25 frames per second, the PowerShot A2300 can also shoot 640 x 480 VGA video at 30* frames per second.

DEDICATED MOVIE BUTTON FOR EASY VIDEO CAPTURE 
Itâ€™s never been easier to shoot videos with a PowerShot digital camera. To make shooting video as natural as snapping pictures, the PowerShot A2300 has a dedicated movie button. No need to plan ahead, no need to search through menus on the LCD screen; when you feel a moment would be best captured in 720p HD, simply press the button and recording begins. The camera is always ready to shoot stills or video whenever you want.

IFRAME
With the PowerShot A2300 digital camera, you can also shoot video in the Apple® iFrame format, which is a computer-friendly standard that speeds up importing and editing of videos. It keeps file sizes small, making it more convenient to upload or e-mail high-quality videos. The iFrame format enjoys native support in compatible Mac and Windows video applications, making it unnecessary to perform time-consuming and often quality-degrading conversions.

HIGH RESOLUTION, HIGHLY ADVANCED PERFORMANCE
16.0 MEGAPIXEL IMAGE SENSOR WITH DIGIC 4 IMAGE PROCESSOR 
With the camera's 16.0 Megapixels of resolution, your images are rich and clear, with textures and tiny details faithfully reproduced even at the long end of the 5x Optical Zoom. This high level of resolution is ideal for creating the largest prints, and allows you the flexibility to blow up and crop any section of an image to express your creativity. The DIGIC 4 Image Processor powers the camera's advanced systems and features, ensuring fast, reliable performance with low battery consumption.

DIGIC 4 IMAGE PROCESSOR 
Canon DIGIC Image Processors have set the standard for functionality and performance since their groundbreaking introduction in 1999. With each successive generation, DIGIC processors have brought elevated performance and powerful new features to PowerShot digital cameras. The DIGIC 4 Image Processor has ushered in a new level of picture quality and accelerated processing, making possible features such as high-speed continuous shooting, HD video and Face Detection Self-timer.

ZOOM IN ON WIDER, STEADIER SHOTS
5X OPTICAL ZOOM WITH 28MM WIDEÂ€“ANGLE LENS 
The 5x Optical Zoom (35mm equivalent: 28-140mm) in PowerShot A2300 digital camera delivers outstanding optical performance and versatility. It gives you a great range of potential images from a single location, which is perfect for sporting events and other occasions when your shooting stance is fixed, or times when moving in too close might disrupt the action you're trying to capture. The lens's 28mm wide-angle perspective puts more image in every frame for dynamic, exciting shots.





SAY GOODBYE TO BLUR
DIGITAL IS
Digital IS beats the blur that mars many shots by recognizing the main subject, then automatically applying the camera shake correction that best suits the situation. If the subject is a person, blur reduction processing is performed. For landscapes, cityscapes and other still scenes, the camera takes 3 quick successive shots and composes them into a single clear image. If the subject is moving, the camera takes 3 successive shots, then automatically saves the clearest image.

HELP YOU WON'T NEED HELP TO FIND
HELP BUTTON
The PowerShot A2300 digital camera is designed to be fun and easy to use, even for beginners. A new Help Button on the camera's exterior brings up the help menu any time you need it, right on the LCD screen. From here, you can scroll through a variety of topics that answer your questions with clear explanations, offer helpful shooting advice, and show you diagrams highlighting the position of any buttons you'll need.

CHARGE UP AND GO!
LITHIUM-ION BATTERY
The Canon PowerShot A2300 digital camera uses a rechargeable Lithium-ion battery. This compact, powerful battery helps make it a lightweight and slim camera. Charge-up is quick and easy, so the PowerShot A2300 will be ready and waiting for those special moments.

A COLOR JUST RIGHT FOR YOU
AVAILABLE IN 4 COLORS
While the classic black camera will always be right for a lot of photographers, Canon recognizes that others will long for colors that express their individuality. Accordingly, the PowerShot A2300 digital camera is offered in a range of hues from subtle to vibrant, fun to chic. Take your pick from black, silver, blue, and red.
feature_bullets: 16.0 MP Image Sensor, DIGIC 4 Image Processor, 5x Optical Zoom, 28mm Wide-Angle lens
720p HD video recording with a dedicated movie button
Smart AUTO with 32 predefined shooting situations
Digital IS reduces effect of camera shake and subject movement
Help Button provides simple explanations and easy controls of your settings
2.7-inch TFT color LCD with wide-viewing angle
720p HD video with dedicated movie button
28mm wide-angle lens (5x optical zoom, 4x digital zoom and 20x combined zoom) with digital image stabilizer
